alert.note: Alert for Fremont County Including Canon City, Howard, Texas Creek; Teller County, Rampart Range Including Pikes Peak and Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 02 at 3:07PM MDT until April 03 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 221 AND 222... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 9 PM MDT MONDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 221 AND 222... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 10 AM to 9 PM MDT Monday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 221 and 222. * Winds...For Today, west winds gusting up to 35 mph. For Monday, southwest winds at 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. For Tuesday, westerly winds gusting up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 8 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Fremont County Including Canon City, Howard, Texas Creek; Teller County, Rampart Range Including Pikes Peak and Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument
